description: Lightly spiced pork meatballs in a creamy sauce with tart cranberry makes for warming comfort food, perfect served with mash.
keywords: Meatballs,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Pork,Peanut free
name: Swedish-Style Meatballs with Cranberry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the mince, allspice, egg yolk and half of the dill in a bowl and mix well. Roll into 16 meatballs.
Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the meatballs, stirring often, for 12-15 minutes or until cooked through.
Add the sour cream and the rest of the dill to the pan with a splash of water and cook for 1 minute.
Serve the meatballs with cranberry sauce and mashed potato if desired.
